about_meta: WackyFoki is a platform for sharing weird and unique recipes from around the world.
about_p1: WackyFoki is a community-based platform for sharing quirky and creative recipes enjoyed around the world. We aim to celebrate imaginative dishes that go beyond traditional boundaries.
about_p2: Anyone can easily upload recipes, browse others‚Äô creations, and interact with comments and likes. Just because it looks strange doesn‚Äôt mean it tastes bad!
about_p3: This space is for those who want to explore new perspectives on food with fun and creativity. WackyFoki welcomes your unique moments.
about_p4: This platform is designed for everyone interested in cooking‚Äîfrom professional chefs to beginners and even curious food enthusiasts.
about_p5: We believe that experimental and unconventional recipes are valuable expressions of creativity. These dishes become pieces of a story and connect people.
about_p6: WackyFoki is more than just a recipe-sharing site. It's a digital playground where people discover, document, and laugh about global food culture together.
about_p7: Your feedback helps make this platform better. Comments, likes, and suggestions all contribute to making WackyFoki a warmer place. Share your special recipe anytime.
about_p8: We‚Äôll continue to run a creative and respectful community. We believe small experiments can grow into worldwide sharing.
about_ops_body: This site is operated individually and may earn revenue through Google AdSense and affiliate programs. Copyright belongs to the respective creators, and inappropriate content may be removed without prior notice. Contact:
about_notice: ‚Äª This platform is user-generated. Admin may remove inappropriate content without notice.
privacy_intro: WackyFoki (the 'Service') values your privacy and complies with the Personal Information Protection Act. This policy explains how your data is collected, used, and protected.
privacy_section1_content:
We collect the following information during Google login:
- Name, Email, Profile Photo
privacy_section2_content: We collect personal data during Google OAuth login process.
privacy_section3_content:
Collected data is used for:
- Login and user identification
- Personalized content delivery
privacy_section4_content: Your data is deleted upon account deletion or at your request.
privacy_section5_content: Your personal data is not shared with third parties, unless required by law.
privacy_section6_content: We may use cookies from Google Analytics and AdSense for tracking and analysis.
privacy_section7_content:
For privacy-related inquiries, contact us at:
üìß example@wackyfoki.com
terms_intro: These Terms govern the rights and responsibilities between users and the WackyFoki platform.
terms_1_content: These Terms govern the use, conditions, and responsibilities between users and the platform.
terms_2_content:
Definitions used in these Terms:
1. ‚ÄòMember‚Äô refers to anyone using the Service.
2. ‚ÄòContent‚Äô refers to uploaded images, text, and video links.
terms_3_content: These Terms become effective upon notice via the site. Changes may be made and announced beforehand.
terms_4_content: WackyFoki allows users to upload and view creative recipes.
terms_5_content: The Service may be temporarily suspended for maintenance, emergencies, or other reasons with prior notice.
terms_6_content:
Users must not:
- Steal others' data
- Upload false content
- Infringe on intellectual property rights
- Violate public morals or laws
terms_7_content: Uploaded content belongs to the user. The Service may display it for non-commercial use.
terms_8_content: The Service is not responsible for the accuracy of user content and does not intervene in user disputes.
alert_invalid_image_format: Only JPG, PNG, and WebP files are allowed.
contact_p1: Have questions about WackyFoki? For partnership inquiries, reports, or feedback, contact us below.
contact_owner_body: This project is personally operated by OriJin. All inquiries: contact@wackyfoki.com
contact_response_guide: We usually respond within 48 hours. Your feedback helps improve WackyFoki.
contact_privacy_notice: Your email is only used for replies and will never be shared. See our Privacy Policy for details.
contact_meta: WackyFoki contact page. We welcome inquiries, reports, and feedback anytime.
